SEARCH
Package handlers

Class AppointmentHandler

java.lang.Object
handlers.AppointmentHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DateAndTime
public class AppointmentHandler extends Object implements DateAndTime
Handles the management of appointments in the system, including scheduling, rescheduling, viewing, recording, and canceling appointments. This class implements the DateAndTime interface for date validation.

      Displays available appointment slots for a given doctor on a specified date.

      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being checked
      scanner - a Scanner object for user input

    • setAppointment

      public void setAppointment(User doctor, Patient patient, Scanner scanner, Appointment existingAppointment)

      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for the appointment
      patient - the patient for the appointment
      scanner - a Scanner object for user input
      existingAppointment - the old Appointment object that will be changed

    • saveDoctorAvailability

      public boolean saveDoctorAvailability(String[] line)
      Saves the availability of a doctor to a CSV file and checking if it clashes with the current schedule.
      Parameters:
      line - an array representing the doctor's new availability data
      Returns:
      true if saved successfully, else false if there is a time conflict
